summary: AN ORDINANCE providing for the acquisition by condemnation of land and other property rights, namely the former Ballard Safeway site, legally described as: Lots 7 to 18, inclusive, block 46, Gilman Park, according to plat recorded in volume 3 of plats, page 40, in King County, Washington; said taking for general municipal purposes including, but not limited to, Ballard Civic/Municipal Center.
